verses.verse: The <S%H4912>proverbs<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%>
To <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H4148>instruction;<s%> to perceive the <S%H561>words<s%> of <S%H998>understanding;<s%>
To <S%H3947>receive<s%> the <S%H4148>instruction<s%> of <S%H7919>wisdom,<s%> <S%H6664>justice,<s%> and <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> and <S%H4339>equity;<s%>
To <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H6195>subtlety<s%> to the <S%H6612>simple,<s%> to the <S%H5288>young<s%> man <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> and <S%H4209>discretion.<s%>
A <S%H2450>wise<s%> man will <S%H8085>hear,<s%> and will <S%H3254>increase<s%> <S%H3948>learning;<s%> and a man of <S%H995>understanding<s%> shall <S%H7069>attain<s%> to wise <S%H8458>counsels:<s%>
To <S%H995>understand<s%> a <S%H4912>proverb,<s%> and the <S%H4426>interpretation;<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise,<s%> and their <S%H2420>dark<s%> <S%H2420>sayings.<s%>
The <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of <S%H1847>knowledge:<s%> but <S%H191>fools<s%> <S%H936>despise<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H4148>instruction.<s%>
My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H4148>instruction<s%> of your <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H5203>forsake<s%> not the <S%H8451>law<s%> of your <S%H517>mother:<s%>
For they shall be an <S%H3880>ornament<s%> of <S%H2580>grace<s%> to your <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H6060>chains<s%> about your <S%H1621>neck.<s%>
My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H2400>sinners<s%> <S%H6601>entice<s%> you, <S%H14>consent<s%> you not.

<S%H518>If<s%> they <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3212>Come<s%> with us, let us lay <S%H693>wait<s%> for <S%H1818>blood,<s%> let us <S%H6845>lurk<s%> privately for the <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H2600>without<s%> <S%H2600>cause:<s%>
Let us <S%H1104>swallow<s%> them up <S%H2416>alive<s%> as the <S%H7585>grave;<s%> and <S%H8549>whole,<s%> as those that <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H953>pit:<s%>
We shall <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H1952>substance,<s%> we shall <S%H4390>fill<s%> our <S%H1004>houses<s%> with <S%H7998>spoil:<s%>
<S%H5307>Cast<s%> in your <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> us; let us <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3599>purse:<s%>
My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H3212>walk<s%> not you in the <S%H1870>way<s%> with them; <S%H4513>refrain<s%> your <S%H7272>foot<s%> from their <S%H5410>path:<s%>
For their <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H7323>run<s%> to <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and make <S%H4116>haste<s%> to <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood.<s%>
<S%H3588>Surely<s%> in <S%H2600>vain<s%> the <S%H7568>net<s%> is <S%H2219>spread<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H1167>bird.<s%> <S%H3671><s%>
And they lay <S%H693>wait<s%> for their own <S%H1818>blood;<s%> they <S%H6845>lurk<s%> privately for their own <S%H5315>lives.<s%>

<S%H3651>So<s%> are the <S%H734>ways<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> one that is <S%H1214>greedy<s%> of <S%H1214>gain;<s%> which <S%H3947>takes<s%> away the <S%H5315>life<s%> of the <S%H1167>owners<s%> thereof.
<S%H2454>Wisdom<s%> <S%H7442>cries<s%> <S%H2351>without;<s%> she <S%H5414>utters<s%> her <S%H6963>voice<s%> in the <S%H7339>streets:<s%>

She <S%H7121>cries<s%> in the <S%H7218>chief<s%> place of <S%H1993>concourse,<s%> in the <S%H6607>openings<s%> of the <S%H8179>gates:<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> she <S%H559>utters<s%> her <S%H561>words,<s%> saying,

<S%H5704>How<s%> <S%H5704>long,<s%> you <S%H6612>simple<s%> ones, will you <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H6612>simplicity?<s%> and the <S%H3887>scorners<s%> <S%H2531>delight<s%> in their <S%H3944>scorning,<s%> and <S%H3684>fools<s%> <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge?<s%>
<S%H7725>Turn<s%> you at my <S%H8433>reproof:<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will <S%H5042>pour<s%> out my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> to you, I will make <S%H3045>known<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%> to you.
<S%H3282>Because<s%> I have <S%H7121>called,<s%> and you <S%H3985>refused;<s%> I have <S%H5186>stretched<s%> out my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H369>no<s%> man <S%H7181>regarded;<s%>
But you have set <S%H6544>at<s%> <S%H6544>nothing<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H6098>counsel,<s%> and <S%H14>would<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> of my <S%H8433>reproof:<s%>
I <S%H1571>also<s%> will <S%H7832>laugh<s%> at your <S%H343>calamity;<s%> I will <S%H3932>mock<s%> when your <S%H6343>fear<s%> <S%H935>comes;<s%>

When your <S%H6343>fear<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> as <S%H7584>desolation,<s%> and your <S%H343>destruction<s%> <S%H857>comes<s%> as a <S%H5492>whirlwind;<s%> when <S%H6869>distress<s%> and <S%H6695>anguish<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> on you.
<S%H227>Then<s%> shall they <S%H7121>call<s%> on me, but I will not <S%H6030>answer;<s%> they shall <S%H7836>seek<s%> me <S%H7836>early,<s%> but they shall not <S%H4672>find<s%> me:
For that they <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> and did not <S%H977>choose<s%> the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%>
They <S%H14>would<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> of my <S%H6098>counsel:<s%> they <S%H5006>despised<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H8433>reproof.<s%>
Therefore shall they <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of their own <S%H1870>way,<s%> and be <S%H7646>filled<s%> with their own <S%H4156>devices.<s%>
For the <S%H4878>turning<s%> away of the <S%H6612>simple<s%> shall <S%H2026>slay<s%> them, and the <S%H7962>prosperity<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%> shall <S%H6>destroy<s%> them.
But whoever <S%H8085>listens<s%> to me shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H983>safely,<s%> and shall be <S%H7599>quiet<s%> from <S%H6343>fear<s%> of <S%H7451>evil.<s%>
